Life Is Challenge

Since the beginning of this summer, I made some videos to record "nature & life". I wish it will give me the same feeling when I look back them. And I also hope it will bring the others the happiness.


The beginning of Summer

The end of Summer(Right click and 'play')

The beginning of Autumn

The middle of Autumn(Right click and 'play')

When you expected more from life, more are taken from your life. What you can expected?
Except taking your courge and accepting the challenge, what else?
